data.message: I think it's great that you are helping the people of Flint..good on you....  Knock it off with the Satanic Devil Horns garbage. He is not your master is he? I know you have to placate the Satanists and Witches who run the music industry in Hollywood but you better start thinking of what "idolatry" is... and what it means to pay homage to the Enemy. Jesus is coming back to destroy the evil one and all his followers.. and that is just plain ..truth.
